name: 陳政翰
objective:
網路與多媒體課程的目的在介紹網路環境中常用的軟體如：Netscape、Internet Explorer、Email、BBS、Gopher、FTP、Telnet… 等。以及多媒體在處理文件、聲音、影像、圖片等資料所應用的各種軟硬體及技術，包括：1. 基本語音處理技術；2. 基本影像處理技術；3. 多媒體硬體介紹；4. 多媒體軟體介紹。
The Network and Multimedia course is to introduce the software most used in internet, such as: Netscape, Internet Explorer, Email, BBS, Gopher, FTP, Telnet, and so on. And how does multimedia process the documents, audio, video, graph, and picture data. This course will also focuses on the following topics: 1. Basic audio information processing techniques. 2. Basic video information processing techniques. 3. Multimedia hardware introduction. 4. Multimedia software introduction.
